content.question: ​The graph of the rational function <math alttext="r"><mi>r</mi></math> given by <math alttext="r open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator 4 x cubed plus 8 x squared plus x minus 3 over denominator 2 x squared plus 3 x minus 2 end fraction"><mi>r</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> has one hole. What is the <math alttext="y"><mi>y</mi></math>-value of the location of the hole?

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
